participant_1.background:
I love to cook and try new recipes, but I usually end up making campfire stew because it's my favorite.
I enjoy playing with my parrot Todd in my spare time.
i prefer summer.
I want to treat my mom to her favorite fast food on this weekend as a celebration of her recovery from cancer.
the idea of working is not my cup of tea.

participant_2.background:
I'm five foot nine inches tall, but I don't care because I love my body.
I was honored to be able to donate blood in honor of my late sister.
My collection of raincoat-wearing toys is priceless.
i play quarterback.
I'm a singer, although my asthma limits my singing to solos.

content.text: Hey! I'm in the mood for campfire stew. Do you have a good recipe?
I do! I'll send it to you. I know you love it.
Thanks! I love spending time in the kitchen. I'm actually a pretty good cook.
Wow, that's awesome! I wish I was more creative in the kitchen.
It just takes a little practice. And I have a great teacher: my parrot Todd.
A parrot? That's amazing! I've always wanted a pet bird.
He's a great companion. I love taking him with me on camping trips.
That sounds like so much fun! I'm not sure my asthma would allow me to go camping, though.
Oh, that's a shame. But I'm sure you can find other ways to enjoy nature.
Thanks. I'm sure I will. Do you have any other pets?
No, just Todd. He's enough for me! What about you?
I have a dog named Charlie. He's a golden retriever.
That sounds adorable! I love golden retrievers
